item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

k so this is willow tree.

// Willow Tree
pEmote = 0x284;
woodcutting[0] = 4;
woodcutting[1] = 30;
if (misc.random(2) == 1) {
woodcutting[2] = 404;
} else {
woodcutting[2] = 409;
}
woodcutting[4] = 1519;
break;

	case 1307:
	case 4674:

what number is xp rate? so i can change on all types of treesâ€¦

also i have custom crowns on my server for me the owner symbol and admin mod symbols same but for donator no1 except admin+ see the symbol by their name and no1 can see my owner symbol so how i fix?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2009, 04:26:35 pm[/size][hr]nice help people -.-
